prompt: Build a vibrant chat list page with a gradient background transitioning from light blue to white. The top app bar should have a matching light blue color with the title 'Conversations' in bold white text and a search icon. Each chat item in the scrollable list should feature a 52px rounded square profile picture on the left with a subtle border, the contact name in bold navy text, a message preview in dark gray, and a timestamp in small gray text on the right. Include a thin horizontal divider and 14px padding per item. Ensure the layout is responsive with smooth scrolling and a lively, colorful aesthetic.
